summary: This will add a simple curved sword in your game.
descriptionHtml:
-=-=Description=-=-
This will add a simple curved sword in your game, which can be crafted in a forge under the daedric section. It has slightly better stats than the daedric sword.

-=-=Installation=-=-
Extract the files inside the data folder from the winrar archive into your skyrim data directory. 
Make sure Simple Curved Sword is checked in your skyrim launcher.
author: Kronaras
